name: Four Block Drop
description:
In 2019, I decided to commit to the goal of finishing a game each month. This was my January game. 

You can probably guess what this is based on.

Controls

Move LeftLeft ArrowMove RightRight ArrowRotate ClockwiseUp arrow / XRotate Counter-clockwiseCtrl / ZSoft DropDown arrowHard DropSpacebarHoldShift / CNew GameNPauseESC / PMuteMFullscreenF11
